blocks.name: cmeas
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the class of measures.
blocks.origin: const class cmeas { measures }

blocks.name: diff.cmeas.s
diff.cmeas.c
diff.cmeas.w
df-meas
blocks.content: Define a measure as a nonnegative countably additive function over a sigma-algebra onto ` ( 0 [,] +oo ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-meas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmeas, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(csiga)), cab(s1, w3a(wf(cv(s1), cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wdisj(s3, cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s2))), cesum(s3, cv(s2), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-meas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ measures =(s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra)‚Ü¶ { s1 |((s1 : s0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà P(s0),((s2[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s3 ‚àà s2, s3))‚Üí(s1 ` ‚ãÉ s2)= sum*(s3 ‚àà s2,(s1 ` s3)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: measbase
blocks.content: The base set of a measure is a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm measbase(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga))))
} = {
  syl6eleq(c1, cuni(crn(csiga)), cdm(cmeas), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)))
  elfvdm(c0, cmeas, c1)
  dmmpti(hs0, cmeas, cuni(crn(csiga)), cab(hs1, w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cdom, com), wdisj(hs3, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs2))), cesum(hs3, cv(hs2), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))))))))
  ssexi(cab(hs1, w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cdom, com), wdisj(hs3, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs2))), cesum(hs3, cv(hs2), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))))))), cab(hs1, wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  mp2an(wcel(cab(hs1, wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(hs1, cv(hs0), universe, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe)
  ss2abi(hs1, w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cdom, com), wdisj(hs3, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs2))), cesum(hs3, cv(hs2), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3))))))), wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simp1(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(hs2, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cdom, com), wdisj(hs3, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs2))), cesum(hs3, cv(hs2), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))))))
  df-meas(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(csiga)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm measbase(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(measures ` c1)‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
} = {
  syl6eleq(c1, ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), dom(measures), c0 ‚àà(measures ` c1))
  elfvdm(c0, cmeas, c1)
  dmmpti(hs0, cmeas, ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), { hs1 |((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà P(hs0),((hs2[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(hs3 ‚àà hs2, hs3))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ hs2)= sum*(hs3 ‚àà hs2,(hs1 ` hs3)))))})
  ssexi({ hs1 |((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà P(hs0),((hs2[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(hs3 ‚àà hs2, hs3))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ hs2)= sum*(hs3 ‚àà hs2,(hs1 ` hs3)))))}, { hs1 |(hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))})
  mp2an({ hs1 |(hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))} ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà ùïå, (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(hs1, hs0, universe, (0[[,]]+‚àû), universe)
  ss2abi(hs1, ((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà P(hs0),((hs2[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(hs3 ‚àà hs2, hs3))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ hs2)= sum*(hs3 ‚àà hs2,(hs1 ` hs3))))), (hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  simp1((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà P(hs0),((hs2[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(hs3 ‚àà hs2, hs3))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ hs2)= sum*(hs3 ‚àà hs2,(hs1 ` hs3)))))
  df-meas(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((0[[,]]+‚àû))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}

blocks.name: measval
blocks.content: The value of the ` measures ` function applied on a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm measval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wceq(cfv(cmeas, c0), cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wceq(cfv(cmeas, c0), cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))))), wcel(cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))), universe))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))), universe), wss(cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), universe))
  ss2abi(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simp1(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), universe), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe))
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(s0, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe)
  ssexg(cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), universe)
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))), universe, cmeas, cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w3a(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))))
  3anbi13d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))), wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
  feq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  raleqdv(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-meas(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(csiga)))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm measval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra)‚Üí(measures ` c0)= { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), (measures ` c0)= { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))}, { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))} ‚àà ùïå)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))} ‚àà ùïå, { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))} ‚äÜ { s0 |(s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))}, { s0 |(s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))} ‚àà ùïå)
  ss2abi(s0, ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2))))), (s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  simp1((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), { s0 |(s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))} ‚àà ùïå, (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(s0, c0, ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), (0[[,]]+‚àû), universe)
  ssexg({ s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))}, { s0 |(s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))}, universe)
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), { s0 |((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))}, universe, cmeas, { s0 |((s0 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(hs0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2)))))})
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ((s0 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(hs0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2))))), ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(s0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí(s0 ` ‚ãÉ s1)= sum*(s2 ‚àà s1,(s0 ` s2))))))

blocks.name: ismeas
blocks.content: The property of being a measure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2016.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2016.)

thm ismeas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, c0)), w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, c0)), w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, c0)), wcel(c1, universe)))
  elex(c1, cfv(cmeas, c0))
  syl5(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simp1(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wi(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe))
  expcom(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe)), wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c1, universe))
  3expb(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  fex2(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cuni(crn(csiga)), universe)
  ex(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, c0)), w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  abfmpel(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(crn(csiga)), c1, universe, cmeas, w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))), w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))))
  df-meas(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  ssexi(cab(hs1, w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))))), cab(hs1, wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  mp2an(wcel(cab(hs1, wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(hs1, cv(hs0), universe, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), universe)
  ss2abi(hs1, w3a(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))))), wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simp1(wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))))
  3anbi123d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wf(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))))), wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  feq12d(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls), nat0, cfv(c1, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c1, emptycls)
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  pweqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1))), cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c1, cuni(cv(s0)))
  esumeq2sdv(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(csiga)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmeas)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(crn(csiga)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(cmeas)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wdisj(s1, cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))))
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

blocks.pretty:
thm ismeas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(measures ` c0)‚Üî((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c1 ‚àà(measures ` c0), ((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1))))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), (c1 ‚àà(measures ` c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  elex(c1, (measures ` c0))
  syl5(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), ((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1))))), c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  simp1((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1)))))
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), ((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚Üí c1 ‚àà ùïå), (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå)
  expcom((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra)‚àß(0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå), (c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  3expb((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fex2(c1, c0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), universe)
  ex(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 ‚àà(measures ` c0)‚Üî((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1)))))))
  abfmpel(hs0, hs1, c0, ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c1, universe, cmeas, ((c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1))))), ((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(hs1 ` s1))))))
  df-meas(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  ssexi({ hs1 |((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(hs1 ` s1)))))}, { hs1 |(hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))})
  mp2an({ hs1 |(hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))} ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà ùïå, (0[[,]]+‚àû)‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  mapex(hs1, hs0, universe, (0[[,]]+‚àû), universe)
  ss2abi(hs1, ((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(hs1 ` s1))))), (hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  simp1((hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(hs1 ` s1)))))
  3anbi123d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), (hs1 : hs0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(hs1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(hs1 ` s1)))), (c1 : c0 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c1 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c1 ` s1)))))
  feq12d(hs1, hs0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c1, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, ((hs1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚Üî(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= 0))

blocks.name: isrnmeas
blocks.content: The property of being a measure on an undefined base sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)

thm isrnmeas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures)‚Üí(dom(c0)‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra)‚àß((c0 : dom(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àß(c0 ` ‚àÖ)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(dom(c0)),((s0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s1 ‚àà s0, s1))‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ s0)= sum*(s1 ‚àà s0,(c0 ` s1)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

blocks.name: dmmeas
blocks.content: The domain of a measure is a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: measbasedom
blocks.content: The base set of a measure is its domain. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)

  isrnmeas(hs0, hs1, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c0))), w3a(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(cdm(c0), cuni(crn(csiga))))

blocks.name: measfrge0
blocks.content: A measure is a function over its base to the positive extended reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: measfn
blocks.content: A measure is a function on its base sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: measvxrge0
blocks.content: The values of a measure are positive extended reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: measvnul
blocks.content: The measure of the empty set is always zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: measge0
blocks.content: A measure is nonnegative. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: measle0
blocks.content: If the measure of a given set is bounded by zero, it is zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: measssd
blocks.content: A measure is monotone with respect to set inclusion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Dec-2016.)

thm measssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  breqtrrd(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2), co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)
  mpd(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))))
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simprbi(wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), cxr))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simplbi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  elxrge0(cfv(c0, c1))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simplbi(wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))))
  elxrge0(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)))
  xraddge02(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c0, c2), co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), cfv(c0, cuni(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))), cesum(hs0, cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  syl112anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))), cesum(hs0, cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)), wcel(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cpw(c3)), wbr(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cdom, com), wdisj(hs0, cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cv(hs0)))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cpw(c3)), wss(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), c3), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c3))
  prssi(c1, c3, cdif(c2, c1))
  elpw(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), c3)
  prex(c1, cdif(c2, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cdom, com), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c3))
  prct(c1, c3, cdif(c2, c1), c3)
  mpbid(w0, wdisj(hs0, cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), cv(hs0)), wdisj(hs0, cpr(cdif(c2, c1), c1), cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wdisj(hs0, cpr(cdif(c2, c1), c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  disjdifprg(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c3)
  disjeq1d(hs0, cpr(cdif(c2, c1), c1), cv(hs0), cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpr(cdif(c2, c1), c1), cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1))))
  prcom(cdif(c2, c1), c1)
  measvun(hs0, c0, c3, cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))
  fveq2d(c0, cuni(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(cuni(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), c2, cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cuni(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c3))
  uniprg(c1, c3, cdif(c2, c1), c3)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), c2), wss(c1, c2))
  undif(c1, c2)
  esumpr2(hs0, c1, cdif(c2, c1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), c3, c3, w0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, c1), c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)), wcel(c1, c3))
  measvxrge0(c0, c3, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)), wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c3))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cdif(c2, c1), c3), wcel(c3, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)))
  measbase(c0, c3)
  difelsiga(c3, c2, c1)
  measvxrge0(c0, c3, cdif(c2, c1))
  ex(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cpnf)))
  orcd(wa(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cpnf))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), nat0, cfv(c0, emptycls), wa(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1))))
  fveq2d(c0, c1, emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1))))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  sylib(wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wss(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))
  eqimss(c1, cdif(c2, c1))
  ssdifeq0(c1, c2)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c3)))
  measvnul(c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(cdif(c2, c1), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm measssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[‚â§](c0 ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(measures ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c2)
} = {
  breqtrrd((c0 ` c1), cle, (c0 ` c2), ((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1))), w0)
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` c1)[‚â§]((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1))), 0[‚â§](c0 `(c2 \ c1)))
  syl(w0, 0[‚â§](c0 `(c2 \ c1)), (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  simprbi((c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), 0[‚â§](c0 `(c2 \ c1)), (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  syl2anc(w0, (0[‚â§](c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[‚â§]((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1)))), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  syl(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  simplbi((c0 ` c1)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*, 0[‚â§](c0 ` c1))
  elxrge0((c0 ` c1))
  syl(w0, (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  simplbi((c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*, 0[‚â§](c0 `(c2 \ c1)))
  elxrge0((c0 `(c2 \ c1)))
  xraddge02((c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c2 \ c1)))
  3eqtr3d((c0 ` c2), ((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1))), (c0 ` ‚ãÉ { c1,(c2 \ c1)}), sum*(hs0 ‚àà { c1,(c2 \ c1)},(c0 ` hs0)), w0)
  syl112anc(w0, (c0 ` ‚ãÉ { c1,(c2 \ c1)})= sum*(hs0 ‚àà { c1,(c2 \ c1)},(c0 ` hs0)), c0 ‚àà(measures ` c3), { c1,(c2 \ c1)} ‚àà P(c3), { c1,(c2 \ c1)}[‚âº]_om, ‚äî(hs0 ‚àà { c1,(c2 \ c1)}, hs0))
  sylibr(w0, { c1,(c2 \ c1)} ‚àà P(c3), { c1,(c2 \ c1)} ‚äÜ c3)
  syl2anc(w0, { c1,(c2 \ c1)} ‚äÜ c3, c1 ‚àà c3, (c2 \ c1)‚àà c3)
  prssi(c1, c3, (c2 \ c1))
  elpw({ c1,(c2 \ c1)}, c3)
  prex(c1, (c2 \ c1))
  syl2anc(w0, { c1,(c2 \ c1)}[‚âº]_om, c1 ‚àà c3, (c2 \ c1)‚àà c3)
  prct(c1, c3, (c2 \ c1), c3)
  mpbid(w0, ‚äî(hs0 ‚àà { c1,(c2 \ c1)}, hs0), ‚äî(hs0 ‚àà {(c2 \ c1), c1 }, hs0))
  syl2anc(w0, ‚äî(hs0 ‚àà {(c2 \ c1), c1 }, hs0), c1 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  disjdifprg(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c3)
  disjeq1d(hs0, {(c2 \ c1), c1 }, hs0, { c1,(c2 \ c1)}, w0)
  a1i(w0, {(c2 \ c1), c1 } = { c1,(c2 \ c1)})
  prcom((c2 \ c1), c1)
  measvun(hs0, c0, c3, { c1,(c2 \ c1)})
  fveq2d(c0, ‚ãÉ { c1,(c2 \ c1)}, c2, w0)
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ { c1,(c2 \ c1)}, c2, (c1 ‚ãÉ(c2 \ c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ‚ãÉ { c1,(c2 \ c1)} =(c1 ‚ãÉ(c2 \ c1)), c1 ‚àà c3, (c2 \ c1)‚àà c3)
  uniprg(c1, c3, (c2 \ c1), c3)
  sylib(w0, (c1 ‚ãÉ(c2 \ c1))= c2, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  undif(c1, c2)
  esumpr2(hs0, c1, (c2 \ c1), (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c2 \ c1)), c3, c3, w0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 = c1, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` c1))
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 =(c2 \ c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 `(c2 \ c1)))
  fveq2(hs0, (c2 \ c1), c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c0 ‚àà(measures ` c3), c1 ‚àà c3)
  measvxrge0(c0, c3, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 `(c2 \ c1))‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c0 ‚àà(measures ` c3), (c2 \ c1)‚àà c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2 \ c1)‚àà c3, c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c2 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà c3)

thm meascnbl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)[(~~>t ` c2)](c0 ` ‚ãÉ ran(c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(TopOpen `(‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(measures ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)‚Üí(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c1 `(s0[+]1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)

blocks.content: Building a measure restricted to the intersection with a given set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)

thm measinb2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, cin(c1, cpw(c2)), cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), cfv(cmeas, cin(c1, cpw(c2)))))

} = {
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, cin(c1, cpw(c2)), cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), cfv(cmeas, cin(c1, cpw(c2))), cres(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), cin(c1, cpw(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))

  resmpt3(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), cin(c1, cpw(c2)))
  mpteq12i(s0, cin(c1, cin(c1, cpw(c2))), cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), cin(c1, cpw(c2)), cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))
  inin(c1, cpw(c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cres(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), cin(c1, cpw(c2))), cfv(cmeas, cin(c1, cpw(c2)))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(cin(c1, cpw(c2)), cuni(crn(csiga))), wss(cin(c1, cpw(c2)), c1))
  measinb(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cin(c1, cpw(c2)), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  measbase(c0, c1)

  sigainb(c1, c2)

  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c1, cpw(c2)), c1))
  inss1(c1, cpw(c2))
  measres(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), c1, cin(c1, cpw(c2)))

  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)

blocks.name: measdivcstOLD
blocks.content: Division of a measure by a positive constant is a measure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: measdivcst
blocks.content: Division of a measure by a positive constant is a measure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
